title: Zepto | SDE 3 | Offer
content:
Education: B.Tech Tier 2 college
Years of Experience: 6
Prior Experience: Software Engineer (MAANG)
Previous Comp: 86L

Date : Oct 2024
Company: Zepto
Title: SDE 3
Location: Bengaluru, India
Salary: 75L
Joining Bonus: 6L
Stock bonus: 80L esops grant vested over 4 years
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 1.01 cr

title: Licious | SDE 1 | Bangalore
content:
Education: Btech Tier 3
Years of Experience: 2
Prior Experience: SDE-I at a Product based MNC
Previous Comp: 14 Lacs (13 Lacs + 1 Lac)
Date of the Offer: November 2024
Company: Licious
Title/Level: SDE I
Location: Bangalore
Salary: 17LPA Fixed
Relocation/Signing Bonus: None
Stock bonus: 1 Lakh ESOP vesting for 4 year
Variable Bonus: 1 Lakh
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 19 LPA (17 + 1 + 1)
Benefits: Standard

Declined the offer as it is was not as per expected. HR refused to negotiate any further.

title: Amazon SDE 2 | L5 | Offer | 4 YOE
content:
Education: B.Tech from Tier 1
Years of Experience: 4.5
Current Company : Product Based
Date of the Offer: October 2024

Current TC: 56LPA
Location: India

Company: Amazon
Title/Level: SDE 2 (L5)

Salary: 45L Base
Relocation/Signing Bonus: 26L first year + 20L second year
Stock bonus: 55lakhs(5, 15, 40,40 percent)
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): First year - 73L

Is this a good offer for an Amazon SDE 2?
